title: Neil Young & Crazy Horse
description:
Neil Young has announced that he will play two New Zealand shows in March next year, supported by his seminal backing band, Crazy Horse.

Neil Young with Crazy Horse:
Wellington: TSB Bank Arena, March 19th
Auckland: Vector Arena, March 20th

Neil Young last played New Zealand as the headlining act at the 2009 Big Day Out and returns on the back of two full-length album releases in 2012: Americana and the latest, Psychedelic Pill. He also released a memoir, Waging Heavy Peace earlier in the year. Check out the video for track 'Ramada Inn' from Psychedelic Pill below. Pre-sale tickets go on sale November 14th with general public tickets on sale November 19th.

Read more: http://www.undertheradar.co.nz/news/5983/Neil-Young-And-Crazy-Horse-New-Zealand-Shows-Announced.utr#ixzz2BZYwmuS9
